Hi, hellow and welcome...

This is my wikipage and "profile" which I (hope to) link to from wherever I need to show off a profile. I've chosen to do it this way, because it's so much easier to have one profile I can use for everything.

=== Who am I? ===

My name is Christoffer Buchholz and I'm a Danish everything-tech enthusiast. I love the idea of open source, and find that Ubuntu is the most suiting operating system for my needs. I'm a programmer, webdesigner, translator, <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/DanishTeam/|proud member of the Danish Ubuntu LoCo team]]</nowiki>, postbote, writer, entrepreneur and libertine.<<BR>>
I have a personal website at http://www.chrisbuchholz.com/ which I at the moment (only) uses as a blog, but the direction of the website has yet to be decided and content can and will change frequently.
